message: Anyone else using the Mac App Store?
We'll use this thread for discussion and I'll post Mac App Store promo codes here.
Me! Didnt know it had promo codes aswell
Yes. They just added them a few weeks ago, and I have a few. I'll get them organized and start posting later today.
I do too but spend more on iOS apps

I like the Mac app store a lot (especially the update feature), however, I have to confess that I've been using it more as a recommendation list, than a place where I buy software. Without the ability to download a demo, I find myself going to the developers site first to download. No way am I dropping 10-50 bucks or more before checking it out first.
Here is a promo code for DiskLibrary it's $40 app for cataloging your files on both your harddrive and DVDs. MKLAKTK9J97W
Finally I get to use a promo code before it expires ;) thanks Justin
